item.description: Challenge our tournament-winning AI system in Connect 4! This isn’t just any AI - it’s an ensemble of 5 neural networks that dominated a comprehensive tournament against 35+ other AI opponents. The AI Opponent You’re playing against “Custom-Ensemble-Top5Models-q” - a sophisticated AI system that: Combines 5 CNN-based Deep Q-Networks trained on 150k-750k games each Uses Q-value averaging for strategic decision making Achieved #1 ranking with 63.4% win rate in tournament play Applies weighted strategy (30%, 20%, 20%, 15%, 15%) based on model performance ðŸ¤– Your Opponent: "

item.title: Automating Your Website Updates with Hugo and GitHub Pages
item.description: I was looking for a way to automate the process behind updating my site, and I found one.
